# TCControlLayoutAnchor.topRight

**Case**

Anchors to the top-right corner, relative to the screen size.

## Declaration

```swift
case topRight
```

## Anchors

- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.bottomCenter**: Anchors to the bottom-center, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.bottomLeft**: Anchors to the bottom-left corner, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.bottomRight**: Anchors to the bottom-right corner, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.center**: Anchors to the center, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.centerLeft**: Anchors to the center-left, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.centerRight**: Anchors to the center-right, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.topCenter**: Anchors to the top-center, relative to the screen size.
- **TCControlLayoutAnchor.topLeft**: Anchors to the top-left corner, relative to the screen size.
